Krhinos did not hear the warning immediately, as the drilling noise 
was getting more and more intense, so he went on.

At the center of the energon vein, though, something blinked. It was 
also getting more and more luminous in there, so eventually, the 
miner stopped.

Krhinos: What the heck is going on? What have I done?!?!?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> --Rukus--
> 
> Rukus yawns as he watches over the readings, they were rather quiet 
> and nothing interesting had happenend yet. That was, of course, a 
> sign that something IS going to happen.
> 
> A small rumble shook the surrounding area, and the readings were 
> signaling that it may be a good time to stop drilling. "Krhinos! 
> Stop the drill!" yells Rukus as he scrambles to dampen the seismic 
> activity. Another more violent rumble shakes the place then there 
is 
> silence.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Krhinos: All right! I'll dig that precious right out of its bed! 
> Tell 
> > me if you read something on scanners.
> > 
> > He turned the Colossus Drill back on and slowly proceeded to 
drill 
> > the energon.
> >
